caption.body: "In Marcello Hutchison-Trujillo’s undergraduate thesis film at San Francisco State University, he compassionately explores the family tension caused by his father’s long-time friendship with an artist experiencing homelessness during the pandemic.   See “A Garden for George” by Marcello Hutchison-Trujillo in the Video Arts Gallery, located pre-security in the International Terminal with daily operating hours of 7:00am to 10:00pm, or online at: http://bit.ly/VideoArts  #agardenforgeorge #marcellohutchisontrujillo #sfsu #VideoArts #VideoArtsSFO
caption.excerpt: "In Marcello Hutchison-Trujillo’s undergraduate thesis film at San Francisco State University, he compassionately explores the family tension caused by his father’s long-time friendship with an artist experiencing homelessness during the pandemic.
